name: 李春穎
objective: 先修課程：材料力學。1.應力、應變、能量、及失效。2.厚壁圓筒。3.圓盤對稱彎曲。4.撓曲、反力、及能量法。5.扭轉。6.非對稱彎曲、剪力中心、及薄壁梁。7.曲梁。8.塑性崩潰、及極限分析。9.梁-柱、挫曲、及非線性。
schedule:
一 	Column, Elastic stability
二	Column, Elastic stability
三	Analysis of Stresses
四	Analysis of Stresses
五	Analysis of Stresses
六	Analysis of strains
七	第一次期中考、Analysis of strains
八	Analysis of strains
九	Stress-strain relations
十	Energy methods
十一	Energy methods
十二	Energy methods
十三	第二次期中考、Asymmetric Bending of beams and curved beams
十四	Asymmetric Bending of beams and curved beams
十五	Torsion
十六	Axisymmetric problems
十七	Collapse analysis
十八	期末考
scorePolicy:
1 出缺席考核與課堂行為表現 (10%)
2 期中考(30%)x2
3 期末考(30%)
materials:
1. Advanced Mechanics of Solids, by L.S. Srinath, 1980, Tata McGraw-Hill Pub.
2. Mechanics of Materials, by J. M. Gere, 2001, Brooks/Cole Pub.
3. Advanced Mechanics of Materials, by R.D. Cook and W. C. Young, 1985, Macmillan pub. Co.
